SOME SOLDIERS WHO WERE FAMOUS ENTERTAINERS (MOVIE, STAGE OR RADIO STARS) OR FAMOUS ATHLETES (SUCH AS BOXERS, BASEBALL OR FOOTBALL PLAYERS) IN CIVILIAN LIFE BEFORE THEY CAME INTO THE ARMY NOW HAVE JOBS IN THE ARMY ENTERTAINING OR COACHING AND DEMONSTRATING SPORTS TO OTHER SOLDIERS.
